subject: Shipping
description_text: Hi, i ordered a set of pedals 6 days ago and its says unfulfilled?

conversations.body_text: ID 为 9877 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单9877  
      主题: Shipping  
      描述:  Hi, I bought a set of pedals on the 30th of December and still yet to receive a shipping email.Just wondering where it is.
Hi Louis Austin,  Please provide your order number, and I will help check it for you.

Hi the order number is SSN5539

On Wed, 7 Jan 2026 at 7:16 am, service@simsonn.com

Hi Louis Austin,  Due to a few days off during the New Year holiday, emails were accumulated, which caused a delay in our response. We sincerely apologize for this. We are currently working overtime to handle the pending matters and will arrange shipment for you as soon as possible. Thank you for your understanding and patience.
Hi Louis Austin,    We apologize for not updating you promptly about your shipment. Your package has been shipped.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224807059
